fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Husk a player at night(attack).
- Banish a Husked player(at any time, resolves immediately, no cooldown).

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Anyone you successfully kill will gain the **Husked** status, which will cause them appear to be alive to themselves and other players, and they will be able to vote/speak. However, they will actually be dead. Husked players don't know that they were attacked by you.
- Husked players do not have access to dead chat, but if an action is used on them at any point by a living player, or if the Husked player were to "die" or be lynched, their Husked status is removed.

fields.name: - Husked players may still perform actions, however:
fields.value:
Their visits are always Astral.
Investigative abilities will produce completely random information.
Killing abilities will produce feedback, but will never actually attack the target.
Any other abilities that have an actual effect on someone will simply not have an effect,
but will still produce feedback.

- "Banishing" a Husked player will remove their Husked status instantly.

- You must rest for a night before attacking again if you attacked two nights in a row.

- No more than 3 players can be Husked at any point. If there are 3 Husked players, your
attacks will not cause killed players to become Husked.

fields.name: Messages:
fields.value: "[victim] was found dead in their home last night. Their body was completely rotten. They were killed by a Revenant."
